body: Reminds me of waka for some reason
my mind already told it was huge tits, its not that big of a deal, maybe some kid will complain about the miss translation but man will just enjoy and fap
Case in point, look at the comment on https://nhentai.net/g/404075/ and you'll see the guy picking out translator's mistake.
If he doesn't do this, someone will be bashing him for the mistake made. But by doing this, he shuts them up. Furthermore nothing wrong with admitting one's mistake.
Take it easy, bro. No need to beat up yourself over small things. Thank you for the hard work your team have been putting into this, stay safe and take care.

Someone pointed out on panda I fucked out and wrote "Hugh Tits" rather than "Huge Tits", well yeah I guess being sleep deprived for almost 3 days straight while working on 3 releases (one didnt made it here because reasons, i guess) was too much of a work load for me that I fucked up, so I will fix it some other time I guess, so a new version should put up here later on too then, if you want the proper corrected version head up to my server though and I will post it there along other things.  discord.gg/8g4WSBdHuG
